channel.title: I got a question about botting
channel.description: Even though most of the time, I hate botters, but I'll make an exception... If you bot, does Jagex ban all of you're accounts, or only the one you bot on? Because I already have a lvl 86, but I don't want to get that banned if I try to make a pure and bot on him.

item.title: I got a question about botting
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

Mopman:

It’s pretty obvious when someone is lying about that shit.

It doesnt have to be. Anyone that has a small brain could go look up stuff about drugs and then put that together and put up a good story o.O

Read full topic

item.title: I got a question about botting
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“ninjasod, post:11, topic:56898”][quote author=Death_666 link=topic=80759.msg902197#msg902197 date=1171524677]
no, they aren’t lying

[/quote]
Did you hear a dam word I just said?
Do you see them doing drugs?
No.
Do they post a pic of them doing drugs?
No.
Does hardly anyone even say they do drugs?
No.
Do you people have a chance of winning this arguement?
No.[/quote]

It’s pretty obvious when someone is lying about that shit.

Read full topic

item.title: I got a question about botting
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“ninjasod, post:8, topic:56898”]Botters are generally lazy, seeing as how they let a program do the work for them…
But seeing as how I’ve pretty much made 10 accounts all level 40+(1 of them 60+ another 80+), I’m getting tired of doing all that work over and over…
And all I can find on villu-reborn is the gay stats for the script, not the script -.-[br][size=1]Posted on: February 14, 2007, 07:59:18 PM[/size][hr]And how the hell do you know if they really use drugs?
Omg I use drugs!
See I said that I did, but I dont.
People say stupid shit that isnt true…
Its like seeing someone survive on tv after they get their head halfway chopped off, then you try to do it…And you die omg!..They lied to you!!! o.O[/quote]

Hahaha, I can’t speak for laughing.

Read full topic

item.title: I got a question about botting
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

Rictoo:

Offtopic: Your sig is gay. Many MANY MANY of the members on this forum use drugs. Forget the shit they taught you in school. Half of it is crap. (I’ve never done drugs)

Not really, members of my family have died off of drugs. I’ve never met my dads parents, or my moms dad, because they have died from alcohol or an accident, or something…

YourDistracted:

Your on it.

That’s true :D[br][size=1]Posted on: February 11, 2007, 10:59:50 AM[/size][hr]

Just create new accounts, get them off tut island, then train them with WT’s Goblin Scheduler.

Where do I get this? I’ve searched on the website and I even googled it, all I can see are the stats for it, not the download…
Rictoo:

Many MANY MANY of the members on this forum use drugs.

And also most of the members of this forum do not use drugs…
Just because they say stupid shit, doesnt mean they’re on drugs…

item.source: I got a question about botting

item.title: I got a question about botting
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

Before you auto (NEVER EVER auto on your main), delete the C:\windows.jagex_cache_32\uid.dat file (UID.dat is a file that has a unique [randomly generated] number in it, it’s what Jagex uses to track you), and also somehow (depends on if you have dsl, cable, or dialup) change your IP.

Offtopic: Your sig is gay. Many MANY MANY of the members on this forum use drugs. Forget the shit they taught you in school. Half of it is crap. (I’ve never done drugs)

Read full topic
